mapper.insert: insert into d_comment(no, diary_no, writer, email, content) values(d_comment_seq.nextval, #{diaryNo}, #{writer}, #{email}, #{content})
mapper.select: select no, diary_no, writer, email, content, register_date from d_comment where diary_no = #{diaryNo} order by no asc
select * from (select * from d_comment where email = #{email} order by no asc) where rownum >=#{start} and rownum <= #{end}
